title: Q&A Answer
description: Machine-readable schema for LLM Q&A responses produced by the assistant.

answer.description: Natural-language answer to the user's question. May include short code snippets, but no machine-editable patch formats.

file_refs.description: List of cited files with a one-line excerpt/snippet and optional line range.

snippet.description: One-line excerpt or short snippet showing context.

start_line.description: Optional starting line number (1-based). Use null when unknown.

end_line.description: Optional ending line number (1-based). Use null when unknown. If provided, should be >= start_line.
